results.content: This fundamentals course was a good first look at Angular 2 with plenty of example to  follow along with and the content clearly explained.
results.content_html: This fundamentals course was a good first look at Angular 2 with plenty of example to follow along with and the content clearly explained.

results.content:
I'm doing 3 Angular2 courses through Udemy. Already realized many courses here. And I have many other paused. And that's my opinion:

I would say that Mr. Le is a good developer, but as a instructor have to improve in some very important points:

- typing a lot of things wrong = So should correct then live, as we are typing ,following together, instead of appearing in the next class with the correct code, but without explaining that there was a mistake in the last class.

- A lot of theory lectures in the beginning = Instead of going presenting what we will use when needed.

- 2 lessons out of order: 1st - used the tool and the next class presented which tool would be used! 2st- classes 42 and 43 are in reverse order.

- And in the application itself (Lagoon) missing check what is being done! == The instructor should write a little code and check if the code is working !!!! EX: create a field,navbar and see if it is displayed on the screen, step by step.

- The source code is incomplete! And also has typing error.

-I hope the instructor understand that this feedback is to let him know where to focus on his weaknesses, and improve his teaching techniques.

PS: Sorry for the poor english.

I would say that Mr. Le is a good developer, but as a instructor have to improve in some very important points:

- 2 lessons out of order: 1st - used the tool and the next class presented which tool would be used! 2st- classes 42 and 43 are in reverse order.

- And in the application itself (Lagoon) missing check what is being done! == The instructor should write a little code and check if the code is working !!!! EX: create a field,navbar and see if it is displayed on the screen, step by step.

- The source code is incomplete! And also has typing error.

results.content:
Very Informative course!
The instructor starts right from the basic concepts of ES6, TypeScript ( which are very useful for  understanding Angular2 concepts).
Then he explains Angular2 concepts with live working examples.
At the end of the course, there is a wonderful hands on Photo Album Project using Angular2 and Semantic-UI framework for GUI design.

In short, you will learn all the concepts of Angular2 and will be able to design Angular2 Web applications.
A+++++++++++
results.content_html:
Very Informative course!
The instructor starts right from the basic concepts of ES6, TypeScript ( which are very useful for understanding Angular2 concepts).

In short, you will learn all the concepts of Angular2 and will be able to design Angular2 Web applications.
A+++++++++++

results.content: Course covers a lot of information.
the Language (accent) could be little bit more clear
results.content_html: the Language (accent) could be little bit more clear

results.content: Great pace, great content, 4 stars instead of 5 due to lecturer's vocal ability
